title: Studsgård
content:
Studsgård is a small railway town in Herning Municipality in central Jutland, Denmark. It is located 8 kilometres (5.0 mi) southwest of Herning. As of 1 January 2024, Studsgård has a population of 434.[1] Studsgård is located at the Skanderborg-Skjern railway line and is served by Studsgård railway station.[2]

56°05′22″N 8°54′26″E﻿ / ﻿56.089444°N 8.907222°E﻿ / 56.089444; 8.907222
